Sorry I didn't post yesterday evening. I had serious computer problems 
(that's why the site was down), and I just got everything working 
again.

::Fenox/Slayer/Recklessa/Starlight::

Fenox smiles at D as he stops shaking, continuing to fly to the 
Alliance base. She was about halfway there now.

"There you go, isn't so bad, is it?" She says, smiling reassuringly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer stops swimming, coming up to Iguanus's body. He grabs an arm, 
swimming up and pulling Iguanus along by it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Slag!" Recklessa yells as Prebon goes under the water. She and 
Starlight follow above.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Iron Fist's scanners detect a bot entering the water, scanning the 
area where Prebon was. There was a little too much debree at the 
moment to get an acurate reading, but it'd be scannable in a few 
seconds.

The Iron Fist prepares its underwater defences.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * D sighed but kept his ears tightly plastered to his head, his feet 
tucked 
> neatly under himself and his tail tucked between his legs.
> He hated hights!
> D cought the smile that Fenox and tried to flash a smile back but he 
was 
> rather nerve wracked. It's not easy to find yourself waking up on 
the air 
> and taking it lightly. But he was slowly getting use to it and it 
was 
> turning out not to be so bad.
> D sto
